title: Master weavers of the Andes
brief_description: Examines the craft of weaving as practised by the Quechua Indians near Cuzco, Peru. Points out that except for the use of chemical dyes, the processes of spinning and weaving are practised as they have been for centuries. Camera and editing Peter Pilafian. Narrated by David Ossman.
